rules: Use JetBrains Mono for code snippets and technical data.
Captions must be uppercase with wide tracking.
No gradients for backgrounds. Use solid, high-contrast colors.
Primary color (#2563EB) is for Main Actions ONLY (Send, Save).
Use 'muted' backgrounds for secondary elements (bubbles, sidebars).
Borders should be subtle but visible (1px solid border-border).
Text contrast must meet WCAG AA standards.

structure: Header: Sticky top, 60px height, flex-row, border-b.
Main Content: Flex-1, overflow-y-auto, p-4, scroll-smooth.
Footer/Input: Sticky bottom, p-4, border-t, bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md.

inputs.classes: h-10 rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

cards.classes: rounded-lg border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm

chat_bubbles.user: bg-primary text-primary-foreground rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm px-4 py-2 max-w-[85%]
chat_bubbles.bot: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm px-4 py-2 max-w-[85%] border border-border/50

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-none for inputs.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a clean look.

images.description: Abstract geometric shapes for empty state background or pattern.
Minimalist abstract texture for bot avatar if needed.

instructions_to_main_agent: Ensure the app fits within a 400x600px popup container.
Use 'Manrope' for body text and 'Chivo' for headings. Import them via Google Fonts in index.css.
Do not use gradients. Stick to solid colors and 1px borders.
Implement a 'Settings' view that slides in or toggles.
The Chat Interface must support streaming text (simulate or handle chunks).
Use the provided image URLs for empty states or backgrounds where appropriate.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic gradients, centered layouts).
Use generous spacing (p-4, p-6) even in a small popup (use scroll).
Micro-interactions are mandatory (hover states, focus rings).
Dark mode support is required (use 'dark:' classes).
